v: §7已激活

v: §7未激活

v: §7卷起

k: §dUnbreakable
v: §d无法破坏

k: when hitting will apply slowness and when right cliked will teleport you to the nearest mob in a small range
v: 命中时施加缓慢，右击时将你传送到小范围内最近的怪物处

k: when right cliked you can teleport and damage near mobs
v: 右击时可以传送并伤害近距离的怪物

k: this weapon will add more xp per kill and when right cliked will give regeneration for some xp
v: 此武器会增加每次击杀怪物的经验值，右击时消耗经验值提供生命恢复

k: this weapon has a chance of burning the target and when right cliked this weapon will spawn a fire ball
v: 此武器有概率点燃目标，右击时生成一个火球

k: when right click the blade can instantaneously kill the target if his helth is below 25% andonce hiting the target this weapon has a chance of stealing the target's health
v: 右击可以瞬间击杀生命值低于25%的目标，并且击中目标时有概率窃取目标的生命值

k: when killing an entity with more than 7 health this weapon will stack souls and when right cliking will release them for a temporary buff (when killing you can stack up multiple souls and when releaset will give a stronger buff 5 souls is the max but when killing target the souls will automatically be released therefore loosing the buffs .This weapon also can apply wither to the targget
v: 此武器击杀生命值大于7的实体时会获得灵魂层数，右击时消耗灵魂层数以获得临时增益（灵魂层数可以叠加，层数越多增益效果越强，5层时达到最大效果）。增益效果期间若击杀目标则灵魂逸散，增益消失。此武器也会对目标施加凋零

k: when hitting the target multiple times in a row this weapon will give you an advantage
v: 此武器多次连续击中目标时会提供增益

k: this weapon has a chance off apply poison to the target and when right clicked will give you a dash and temporary strength
v: 此武器有概率为目标施加中毒，右击时进行一次冲刺并获得临时的力量效果

k: right click with the proper enchantement and with 30xp levels to make it suitable for upgrading your gear.
v: 当附有适当的魔咒并拥有30级经验时右击，使此物品能用于升级你的装备。

k: this weapons has a chance of multihitting the target and when right cliked will turn into op sword for a few moments
v: 此武器有概率对目标造成多次攻击，右击时变成op剑一段时间

k: this weapon has more knokback and will prevent you from dying every 9 minutes
v: 此武器有更高的击退，并且每9分钟可以防止你死亡1次

k: you need to enchant it with the proper enchantment and have 30 xp levels to make it suitable for upgrading.
v: 你需要为此物品附上适当的魔咒，并拥有30级经验等级，才能使此物品可以用于升级。

v: 是时候砸点头颅了

v: 硬如铁，脆如石！

k: The helmet of a rogue hero... Press F to temporarily regenerate health and gain resistance at the expense of hunger.
v: 一个流氓英雄的头盔……按F可以暂时恢复生命值并获得抗性提升，代价是获得饥饿。

k: Common gear used by those who wander without a name
v: 那些无名的流浪者使用的普通装备

k: More durable than normal samurai armor. Wearing the full set grants bonus movement and attack speed
v: 比普通的武士盔甲更耐用。穿戴全套装备可获得额外的移动和攻击速度

k: By far the heaviest and most durable armor money can buy.Even capable of dealing damage to those who manage to hit you! Highly protective although your movement speed is slowed.
v: 目前为止用钱能买到的最重、最耐用的盔甲。甚至能对那些想攻击你的人造成伤害！高度的保护，尽管会减慢你的移动速度。

k: Standard boots for any Crusading Knights
v: 所有十字军骑士的标准靴子

k: For the Desianic Republic!
v: 为了德西安共和国！

k: Worn by a crusader so devoted to his cause that he overcame death itself to see it through.
v: 一位献身事业的十字军战士所穿戴的装备，他克服了死亡本身，度过了难关。

k: Armor worn by undead beings who's only goal is the destruction of the living. Grants the wearer the ability to purge poison and wither if afflicted.
v: 亡灵生物所穿的盔甲，他们的唯一目标是毁灭活物。赋予装备者清除受到的中毒和凋零效果的能力。

k: Common gear used by those who wander without a name.
v: 那些无名的流浪者使用的普通装备。

k: Armor worn by elite warriors from a long past war. Wearing this with the Elite Sentinel's Helmet and normal Sentinel legs and boots grant you a 20% chance for the armor to fully block an attack.
v: 很久以前的战争中精英战士所穿的盔甲。将其与精英哨兵头盔、普通哨兵护腿和靴子搭配使用，可使盔甲有20%的概率完全阻挡攻击。

k: Armor worn by elite warriors from a long past war. Wearing this with the Elite Sentinel's Plate Armor and normal Sentinel legs and boots grant a 20% chance for the armor to fully block an attack.
v: 很久以前的战争中精英战士所穿的盔甲。将其与精英哨兵板甲、普通哨兵护腿和靴子搭配使用，可使盔甲有20%的概率完全阻挡攻击。

k: For the Estanese Order!
v: 为了伊斯坦骑士团！

k: Audaces fortuna juvat! Less protection for increased strength.
v: 愿命运之神保佑勇者！较低的保护能力，但能增加力量。

v: 标准的浪人服装。搭配翘楚浪人长袍和极鬼面斗笠，获得鬼魂冲刺能力

k: A set of robes worn by a warrior who was said to fight like a demon. Wearing the full set grants the Oni Rush ability

v: 传说中像魔鬼一样战斗的战士所戴的面具和帽子。穿戴全套装备以获得鬼魂冲刺能力

k: Heavy armor worn by hardened veterans. Wearing the full set grants a 10% chance for the armor to fully block an attack

k: Heavy armor worn by hardened veterans. Wearing the full set grants a 10% chance for the armor to fully block an attack. Can be upgraded.

k: An ancient set of armor worn by a warrior who's existence transcends human understanding known as the Demon of the Mist. Equipping the full set grants the wearer the ability to temporarily heighten their endurance and attack speed at the cost of movement speed
v: 一位超越人类理解的、被称为迷雾之魔的存在所穿的一套古老的盔甲。装备全套盔甲使佩戴者能够以移动速度为代价暂时提高耐力和攻击速度

k: Rugged and simple equipment
